enemies

Class HealthBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameMembers.Drawable
      • enemies.HealthBar

  • public class HealthBar
extends Drawable

    HealthBar

    This class is meant to handle everything related to the health of a monster on the screen. It should only be used as a variable object in a monster's class. This object should be passed the new location of the monster every turn and will follow it around the screen.

    This class's graphical representation is composed of an Image and 2 instances of Rectangle. The Rectangle is used to represent the health of the character. (TODO: change this, maybe?)

    Author:
    Hughes

    • Field Detail

      • healthTotal

        public float healthTotal
        This float represents the total amount of health that a character has. Since it's final, it can't be changed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HealthBar

        public HealthBar(float health,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float scale)
        The constructor sets up the object with the character in mind. It immediately sets hp to maximum.

        float scale should be experimented with. It'll take some trying to find the correct amount to scale this object by.

        Parameters:
        health - the total amount of health that the character has
        x - the current x location of the character
        y - the current y location of the character
        scale - the scale of the HealthBar

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)

        draw

        Draws the HealthBar to the screen.

        Specified by:
        draw in class Drawable
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object required to make this work

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(float damage)

        takeDamage

        This method is called when the hp should be changed. Give a negative value to increase the health and a positive one to take away health.
        It also caps health so that it can't go below 0 or above maximum.

        Parameters:
        damage - The amount to modify health by
